name: eraro
description: Create JavaScript Error objects with code strings, context details, and templated messages.

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test && npm audit --production
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run reset && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm test && npm run repo-tag --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: Richard Rodger (http://richardrodger.com)
